channel.title: Cataclysm
channel.description:
My goal here is to make a fun server, with an economy and lots of things to do.
Development Team Matt0wn3r Mute
Media [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2n8bm6e.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2zebg39.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2vbpwlt.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2pp0dhz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/295zmn5.png[/img]
Updates December 6 -Added better herblore with making all extremes (no overloads) -Added more npcs with correct attack and death anims
December 8 -Added full slayer dungeon (The fremmink one or w/e) -Added full lumbridge slayer dungeon -Added teletabs -Added pvp artifacts, pvp drops, and a npc that buys them ...Going to be adding slayer tasks
December 9 -Added better crafting -Two new bosses added (You fight them both at the same time)
December 10 -A new boss added -Terrible pi slayer added... to be upgraded -Barrows finished, pretty good not 100% perfect but it's decent enough.
December 11 -Hiscores implemented -Completionst cape added -New crowns for mod and admin -A whole new client loading screen and login screen -Slayer tasks are now a lot better -Vote4cash added -Veteran cape added
December 12 -Spell teleports.. wasn't using for anything so ya -Redid slayer tasks and slayer requirements for tasks -NEX ADDED (hp bar glitched :l) -Highscores finally 100% working
December 13 -Frost dungeon added -Added tome of frost -Even more slayer stuff fixed or added -Awesome new woodcutting, supports stumps, good timers, and all hatchets (Up to 15 logs in a tree). -Auto donations up
December 14 -Added completionist cape requirements and a way to get -Website fully done

item.title: Cataclysm
item.dc:creator: @MattOwn3r MattOwn3r
item.description:
@MattOwn3r wrote:

My goal here is to make a fun server, with an economy and lots of things to do.

Development Team
Matt0wn3r
Mute

Media

2n8bm6e.png753×494

2zebg39.jpg752×494

2vbpwlt.png753×493

2pp0dhz.png773×519

295zmn5.png754×492

Updates
December 6
-Added better herblore with making all extremes (no overloads)
-Added more npcs with correct attack and death anims

December 8
-Added full slayer dungeon (The fremmink one or w/e)
-Added full lumbridge slayer dungeon
-Added teletabs
-Added pvp artifacts, pvp drops, and a npc that buys them
…Going to be adding slayer tasks

December 9
-Added better crafting
-Two new bosses added (You fight them both at the same time)

December 10
-A new boss added
-Terrible pi slayer added… to be upgraded
-Barrows finished, pretty good not 100% perfect but it’s decent enough.

December 11
-Hiscores implemented
-Completionst cape added
-New crowns for mod and admin
-A whole new client loading screen and login screen
-Slayer tasks are now a lot better
-Vote4cash added
-Veteran cape added

December 12
-Spell teleports… wasn’t using for anything so ya
-Redid slayer tasks and slayer requirements for tasks
-NEX ADDED (hp bar glitched :l)
-Highscores finally 100% working

December 13
-Frost dungeon added
-Added tome of frost
-Even more slayer stuff fixed or added
-Awesome new woodcutting, supports stumps, good timers, and all hatchets
(Up to 15 logs in a tree).
-Auto donations up

December 14
-Added completionist cape requirements and a way to get
-Website fully done
